Ighodaro Christian Osaguona (amụrụ 10 Ọktoba 1990) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ Naịjirịa nke gbara bọọlụ na nso nso a na Al-Shorta nke nọ na Iraq Premier League dị ka onye ọkpọ
Na 13 Jenụwarị 2020, Osaguona bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ọkara oge ya na ndị mmeri Persian Gulf Pro League Persepolis
Ọzọkwa, ndị Reds Iran nwere nhọrọ ịgbatị nkwekọrịta ya maka otu afọ ọzọ
Na 9 Septemba 2020, onye ọkpọ ahụ hapụrụ Persepolis ka ya na Al-Shorta banye nkwekọrịta na Premier League Iraq

Akpọrọ Osaguona maka otu mba maka asọmpi ntozu mba Africa nke 2015 wee soro ndị otu egwuregwu mba ụwa mbụ ya na 10 Septemba 2014 n'ime na megide South Africa (0–0), ka ọ batachara dịka onye nnọchi Gbolahan
Salami na nkeji 63 nke egwuregwu ahụ
